roleset.name: apply heat to water

roles.note: No Examples found of usage with agent, but it could arise.

example.name: Arg 1 & TMP
example.text: This seafood restaurant has a lobster boil every Wednesday from five to nine.
example.arg: every Wednesday from five to nine.

example.name: Arg 1 & ArgMs only
example.text: The family enjoyed a traditional Louisiana seafood boil on the beach.
example.note: Keep in mind that a "Louisiana" style boil doesn't necessarily take place in Louisiana, thus it cannot be LOC.

roleset.note: Roleset based on verb boil.01, OntoNotes grouping boil-n sense 3 (seems like rare sense, but oh well); maps to VN classes 45.3, 26.3-2, Framenet entries Cause harm, Heat, Apply heat.
